results.headline: MAN'S BEST FRIEND (MOVIE)
results.summary_short: Reporter's DNA-altered killer dog. Run-of-the-puppy-mill horror.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Man's Best Friend

results.headline: DANGEROUS GAME (MOVIE)
results.summary_short: Harvey Keitel has served the director Abel Ferrara as an obsessive detective in "Bad Lieutenant," and here he is Eddie Israel, a thoroughly depraved movie director. Eddie has an attitude problem, and that is hard on his family and the actors in his film in progress, "Mother of Mirrors," starring Sarah Jennings (Madonna in a rather demure role). As in the earlier film, the result is a scorching psychodrama, and Mr. Keitel's ability to immerse himself in Mr. Ferrara's stories of self-abasement is once again stunningly complete.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Dangerous Game
